lexUnit.name: avoidance.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the fact or practice of keeping away or refraining from

sentence.text: It says avoidance of the substance causing the allergy is the first line of treatment followed by drugs , where possible , to relieve symptoms and by desensitisation in a few selected cases .
